body_html: Same here, I have experienced some unexpected behavior with is_training=False. What is the correct way to change this flag? I am currently using a tf.cond because it does not take tf.placeholders by itself.
body_text: Same here, I have experienced some unexpected behavior with is_training=False. What is the correct way to change this flag? I am currently using a tf.cond because it does not take tf.placeholders by itself.
body: Same here, I have experienced some unexpected behavior with is_training=False. What is the correct way to change this flag? I am currently using a `tf.cond` because it does not take `tf.placeholders` by itself.
